name: Trial Bike VS Police Heli
description:
This is tricky stunts simulation game among tricky bike games with hot bike off-road big bang racing stunts in which police helicopter survive your stuntman and want to arrested. As you super hero perform insane tricky motorbike stunts and motocross stunt trial extreme .This Sim game have the motorcycle adventure multiple unique challenge of riding bike championship and driving in xtreme bang stunt of speed motorcycle and police helicopter.
Stunt drive to perform daredevil frontier extreme 360° turbo bike champion nitro bike stunts at highway traffic rider and become super BMX bike ride jumper. New bike stunt and police helicopter is a new death of well simulation game of real motorbike games 2018 in which you will enjoy heavy motorbike and motorcycle stunting on world's endless impossible racing tracks. Here become the new dirt biker real stunts king rider to showing traffic driver skills.
Tricky bike Survive Police helicopter have steer your bike through bizarre risky routes and amazing dodge treacherous difficult obstacles. Leap over fiery grand rooftops of this cool fantasy city in which helicopter flying on your head! Here you perform massive jumps, mid-air amazing ramps, a variety of tricky tracks, and extreme super stunts! Bike and helicopter are no match for your insane fast and slow speed. So here experience this great stunt thrilling adventure now!
This is an action packed stunts downside game. Make jumper bike on the edge with your rooftop extreme stunt bike ! Drive your best real stunt bike,motocross,heavy bikes to tighten your unique futuristic seat belt and speed up through some challenging crazy levels of motorbike real stunts racing like in rooftop games and motorbike stunt games. In which each level is more x3m thrilling than the previous level. New shadow bike 2018 perform some serious crazy speed stunts in this motocross game and race to the finish line really fast otherwise police helicopter reach first as result your level failed.
You trial bike should be extreme frontier fast and reach finish line first but this is not easy because obstacles, drums, dangerous roads, canvas and tricky tracks make your racing hard. So you drive carefully to cross all obstacles and reach finish line first. If police helicopter reach finish line first then your level failed as result you arrested.


Features:

-Super Realistic Explosive Sounds Effects
-Police helicopter sounds
-New Bike models
-Very Smooth and Easy unique Controls
- Amazing Multiple environments on this multilevel game
